ygData.subject: Re: get this
ygData.msgSnippet: levels don t work quite that way...if someone is a level higher they should be a little better depending on their training path of course....if you take two
ygData.messageBody:
levels don't work quite that way...if someone is a level higher they
should be a little better depending on their training path of course....if
you take two fighters....exactly the same training paths and put them so 1
is 15 and one is 16...the 16 should win because he will have more HP and
have a little more skill...but all in all...its going to be a good fight.
1 level difference should not make that much difference...but 3 or 4+
levels should, especially in a multiple level game.

Korm
